import axios from 'axios'; import React, { Component } from 'react' import AppURL from '../../api/AppURL'; class MegaMenuAll extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { MenuData: [] } } componentDidMount() { axios.get(AppURL.AllCategoryDetails).then(response => { this.setState({ MenuData: response.data }); }).catch(error => { }); } MenuItemClick = (event) => { event.target.classList.toggle("active"); var panel = event.target.nextElementSibling; if (panel.style.maxHeight) { panel.style.maxHeight = null; } else { panel.style.maxHeight = panel.scrollHeight + "px" } } render() { return (
